Implication: "There are two children inside the house."
Referring expressions: Two children, home.  Two children, house
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsAtHome(b) and (IsChild(a) or IsChild(a)))) & (forall e (forall d ( IsAtHome(d) ->  IsInsideTheHouse(e)))) & (forall f (forall g ( IsInsideTheHouse(f) ->  IsAtHome(g))))) -> (exists c (exists b (exists a (IsInsideTheHouse(c) and (IsChild(a) or IsChild(b))))))
